document.full_text: iran has intensified its crackdown on opponents as well as executions of drug traffickers, political prisoners and juvenile criminals, the united nations said on monday.
document.title: iran has intensified crackdown, executions: u.n.
lines_and_colors: iran has intensified its crackdown on opponents as well as executions of drug traffickers, political prisoners and juvenile criminals, the united nations said on monday.
